name: B.Tech in Information Technology
author: C.V.R.C.E
content: Apart from the study plan laid out by the College, I was immensely driven to make games. Have a look:
bullets: Ventured into Unity realm and created a casual puzzle game called Monster Shuffle (bit.ly/monster-shuffle), and posted it to itch.io
Created a WYSIWYG Editor (bit.ly/box2d-flash) in Flash Professional for Box2D physics engine that allowed creation of physics-based games, like Angry Birds
